def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_large_dark = is_large(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx) and is_darker(x, y, ctx)
            check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_lighter_x = is_lighter(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_above_right_x = is_above(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_xy_very_close = get_distance(x, y, ctx) < 0.1
            if (
                check_xy_large_dark
                and check_y_smaller_x
                and check_y_lighter_x
                and check_y_above_right_x
                and check_xy_very_close
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
